T02D3676:308a-1: tsinta ma ni t'a r'a s'a dha na n'am /
T02D3676:308a-3: sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3676:308a-4: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3676:308a-5: yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bas //
T02D3676:308a-6: tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang //
T02D3676:308a-7: gzhan yang 'dod pa sgrub byed pa //
T02D3676:308a-8: sgrol ma la btud sgrub thabs bri //
T02D3676:308a-9: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas rang gi sems nyid
T02D3676:308a-10: t'am gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bur blta ste
T02D3676:308a-11: / 'od zer spros bsdus nas yongs su gyur pa las rin po che t'am gis mtshan pa bsam /
T02D3676:308a-12: de la yang spro bsdu byas te gyur pa las
T02D3676:308a-13: bdag nyid sgrol ma gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu
T02D3676:308a-15: phyag gnyis ma padma dang nyi ma la zhabs sgeg pa'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3676:308a-16: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan can phyag g-yas kyis rin po che brla'i thad kar bzung ba /
T02D3676:308a-17: dpag bsam gyi shing la rgyab brten pa'i yal ga phyag g-yon gyis bzung ba /
T02D3676:308b-0: de'i thugs kar rin po che h'um gis mtshan par @308b bsams /
T02D3676:308b-1: phyag mtshan dang sa bon las 'od 'phros pas sems
T02D3676:308b-2: can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal te
T02D3676:308b-3: tshur 'dus pas rang gi sku gsal btab cing slar
T02D3676:308b-4: thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas ye shes pa gzhug
T02D3676:308b-5: pa dang / dbang bskur ba bya ste /
T02D3676:308b-6: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rgyas gdab po //
T02D3676:308b-7: snga ma ltar 'od spro zhing bsdu bas sku gsal btab cing mi bskyod pa'i bar du bsgom mo //
T02D3676:308b-8: skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya ste rang gi
T02D3676:308b-9: sa bon dang sngags las 'phros pa'i 'od kyis de
T02D3676:308b-10: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud bskul te /
T02D3676:308b-11: 'bru dang rin po che la sogs pa 'dod pa'i
T02D3676:308b-12: yon tan thams cad kyi char 'bab par bsam zhing
T02D3676:308b-13: ngag tu aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsinta
T02D3676:308b-14: ma ni dharbhya birbhya sv'a h'a /
T02D3676:308b-15: de las skyon ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa mi dmigs par bya'o //
T02D3676:308b-17: sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs /
